popover.primary: A mastery path focused on healing and restorative powers
A mastery path focused on offensive and damaging powers
A mastery path focused on hindering and weakening foes

data.name: Reinforce War Engine
data.description: You heal the ram for 750 health over the next 5 seconds.

data.name: Cleanse War Engine
data.description: Siege Targetted cleanse. Removes two siege specific debuffs from a friendly siege engine.

data.name: Shield the Skies
data.description: Ranged siege engines will deal 90% of the normal damage to you. You will also protect two other group mates within 40 feet. Only one effect of this type may be on a player at a time.

data.name: Flee
data.description: You run away from the battle in a mad panic, increasing your run speed by 30% for 10 seconds.  You immediately lose all of your action points, any career mechanic points, and your Morale will begin to drop, and you will not begin to regain action points until 10 seconds have passed.

data.name: Gift of Life
data.note:
Only usable on Dead Players
Builds Force & Tranquility increases effectiveness.
data.description:
Resurrects your target with 20% health.

1-4 Tranquility: 25% Cast Time reduction.
5 Tranquility: 50% Cast Time reduction and resurrects your target with 50% health.

data.name: Lambent Aura
data.description:
Heals your target for 1520 health over 15 seconds.

1-4 Force: Healing increased by 15%.
5 Force: Healing increased 45%.

data.name: Dissipating Hatred
data.description: You Detaunt your target, making them hate you less and causing them to deal only 50% damage to you for 15 seconds. You will also deal 50% damage to them until the effect is broken. If you attack anyone that you have Detaunted, the effect will immediately end.

data.name: Divine Favor
data.description: A strong heal that will restore 1800 health to your target.

data.name: Centuries of Training
data.description: Upon striking a target with direct damage there is a 25% chance to inflict an additional 303 Spirit damage over 3 seconds.

data.name: Rampaging Siphon
data.description: Deals 600 damage to all enemies within 25 feet, and heals group members within 100 feet for the full amount of the damage dealt.

data.name: Divine Fury
data.description:
You deal 25% more damage, but your healing output is reduced by 20%.
Does not affect damage procs.

data.name: Walk Between Worlds
data.description: You can not be set back for 5 seconds and detaunts all enemies around you for 10 seconds, making them hate you less and reducing the damage they deal to you to 50%. You will also deal 50% damage to them until the effect is broken.

data.name: Empowered Lores
data.description: When consuming 5 Tranquillity points, your Critical Damage and Critical Healing is increased by 50% for 5 seconds. When consuming 5 Force points, your Intelligence and Willpower is increased by 240 for 5 seconds.

data.name: Discipline
data.description: Increases your Willpower by 160.

data.name: Steal Life
data.description: Your target suffers 1200 damage over 9 seconds, and you are healed for half of the damage dealt.

data.name: Balanced Mending
data.description: Your Healing Energy is 15% more effective and will now restore 25 Action Points to the target.

data.name: Bend the Winds
data.description: Increases your Elemental resistance by 252.

data.name: Drain Magic
data.description:
You siphon magic from your target, draining 140 Action Points over 7 seconds into yourself.

1-4 Force: Additionally gives Action Points to your defensive target.
5 Force: Additionally gives Action Points to group members within 100 feet.

data.name: Magical Infusion
data.description:
Bind yourself to one ally for 30 seconds, increasing your healing proficiency to them. All your healing abilities are 15% more effective on them.
This effect stacks with other sources that increase healing on the target.

data.name: Focused Mind
data.description: For the next 10 seconds, you will remove and ignore any rooting, snaring, disarming, silencing or disabling effects. Your cast times are reduced by 50%, and you cannot be set back.

data.name: Isha's Encouragement
data.description: If Cleansing Light successfully removes an effect from an ally, then they will also regain 534 health over 9 seconds.

data.name: Discerning Offense
data.description: Your attacks have a 10% reduced chance to be defended against.

data.name: Divine Protection
data.description: Each group member within 100 feet is surrounded by a protective shield for the next 10 seconds that will absorb up to 4500 damage from melee abilities.

data.name: Wind Blast
data.description: You call forth a powerful gust of wind which slams into enemies within 20 feet of you, knocking players away a medium distance and knocking monsters down.  Anyone hit by the wind becomes snared, reducing their run speed by 30% for 5 seconds.

data.name: Sacrificial Renewal
data.description: Whenever you critically heal an ally with a direct healing ability, you increase the power of your heals by 15% for 5 seconds, but you also take 10% more damage from all sources.

data.name: Light of Isha
data.description: Lambent Aura now heals two additional allies within 15 feet of your target.

data.name: Master of Tranquility
data.description: Increases your chance to critically heal by 10%.

data.name: Isha's Ward
data.description: You gain a shield that absorbs 3600 damage for 30 seconds.

data.name: Restorative Burst
data.description: Any time one of your direct healing effects critically heals an ally, you will regain 40 Action Points over 3 seconds.

data.name: Hurried Restore
data.description: Gift Of Life now resurrects allies instantly, but stuns you for 3 seconds.

data.name: Blinding Light
data.description: For 5 seconds, your target and all other enemies within 20 feet of them will take an additional 1 second to build up all abilities.

data.name: Master of Force
data.description: Increases your chance to critically hit enemies by 10%.

data.name: Transfer Magic
data.description: Drain Magic will now siphon energy from an area 10 feet around your initial target, but will only drain 70 Action Points over 7 seconds from each target.

data.name: Arcane Suppression
data.description: Deals 900 damage and Silences all enemies within 20 feet of your target for 3 seconds, making them unable to use magic.

data.name: Run Between Worlds
data.description: Reduces the cooldown time for Walk Between Worlds by 50%.

data.name: Desperation
data.description: Your healing abilities become 40% more effective when the target is below 30% hit points.

data.name: Alter Fate
data.description: Restores 1800 health to all group members within 100 feet and increases your outgoing healing by 35% for 10 seconds.

data.name: Healing Energy
data.description:
Your target regains 309 health immediately, then continues to gain another 370 health over 5 seconds. This ability will continue to build up even if you move.

1-4 Tranquility: Healing increased by 15%.
5 Tranquility: Healing increased by 45%.

data.name: Prismatic Shield
data.description: Increases all resistances of everyone in your group within 100 feet by 240 for 1 hour.

data.name: Boon of Hysh
data.description:
Heals your target for 1125 health.
This is a fragile spell, and will sometimes be set back by a small amount if you are damaged while casting it.

1-4 Tranquility: 25% Cast Time reduction.
5 Tranquility: 50% Cast Time reduction and your ally will deal an additional 112 Spirit damage each time they critically hit for the next 10 seconds.

data.name: Cleansing Light
data.note:
Target must be Hexed or Ailing
Builds Tranquility
Force increases effectiveness.
data.description:
You cleanse an ally's wound and remove one Ailment or Hex. If an effect is removed, your ally will absorb up to 262 damage over 10 seconds.

1-4 Force: Reduces cooldown by 2 seconds.
5 Force: Reduces cooldown by 2 seconds and cleanse an additional Ailment or Hex.

data.name: Blessing of Isha
data.description:
Heals your entire group for 898 health.

1-4 Tranquility: 25% Cast Time reduciton.
5 Tranquility: 50% Cast Time reduction and heals for an additional 624 health over 6 seconds.

data.name: Bolstering Boon
data.description: Any time your direct heal critically heals an ally, they will gain 60 points of Morale over 3 seconds.

data.name: Mistress of The Marsh
data.description: For 10 seconds, all enemies within 15 feet of a spot that you select will have their Initiative reduced by 100 and become snared, reducing their run speed by 60%.

data.name: Apotheosis
data.description: Any time you use Cleansing Light on an ally, you will now remove one Hex or Ailment from all group members within 50 feet of them.

data.name: Funnel Essence
data.description:
You focus your powers on your defensive target, restoring up to 1524 health to them over 3 seconds. If used on an ally affected by Magical Infusion, their chance to be critically hit is reduced by 10% for the duration of the channel. This effect will end if you break your concentration, or if you run out of action points.

1-4 Tranquility: Healing increased by 15%.
5 Tranquility: Healing increased by 30% and castable on the move.

data.name: Wild Healing
data.description: Increase your Critical Healing by 25%. Reduce the Action Point cost of Boon of Hysh and Blessing of Isha by 10.

data.name: Phoenix's Rejuvenation
data.description:
Heals all group members within 100 feet for 735 health over 5 seconds.

1-4 Force: Healing increased by 15%.
5 Force: Healing increased by 30% and duration increased by 2 seconds.

data.name: Winds' Protection
data.description: All group mates within 100 feet regain 2400 health over 15 seconds, and become surrounded by a magical barrier which will absorb 3600 damage.

data.name: Radiant Lance
data.description:
A lance of brilliant energy erupts from your staff, dealing 477 Spirit damage to your target.

1-4 Tranquility: 25% Cast Time reduction.
5 Tranquility: 50% Cast Time reduction and 2 seconds after hitting the target, they get hit an additional time for 50% of the original damage.

data.name: Law of Conductivity
data.description:
Deals 980 Spirit damage to your target over 15 seconds.

1-4 Force: Damage increased by 15%.
5 Force: Damage increased by 30% and target receives 5% more damage.

data.name: Searing Touch
data.description:
You concentrate on your target for up to 6 seconds, repeatedly dealing 477 Spirit damage to them as long as you maintain your concentration.

1-4 Tranquility: Strikethrough increased by 10%.
5 Tranquility: Strikethrough increased by 10% and additionally slow the target by 40% for as long as you are channeling.

data.name: Radiant Gaze
data.description:
Deals 768 Spirit damage over 9 seconds and reduces your target's damage and chance to critically hit by 5%.

1-4 Force: Damage increased by 15%.
5 Force: Damage increased by 30% and debuff increased by 5%.

data.name: Fury of Asuryan
data.description:
Calls forth the wrath of Asuryan in the form of a pillar of magical energy, dealing 434 Spirit damage to your target.

1-4 Tranquility: Damage increased by 15%.
5 Tranquility: Damage increased by 30%. Your outgoing damage is increased by 10% for 5 seconds.

data.name: Radiant Burst
data.description: Radiant Lance and Radiant Gaze will now affect all enemies within 20 feet of your target, but their range is reduced to 80 feet and they do 30% less damage.

data.name: Cleansing Flare
data.description:
Deals 287 Spirit damage to your target and all other enemies within 20 feet of them, and knocks them backwards.

1-4 Tranquility: 25% Cast Time reduction.
5 Tranquility: 50% Cast Time reduction and knockback distance increased.

data.name: Dispel Magic
data.description: All of your damaging spells gain a 25% chance to remove 1 Blessing from the victim.  Whenever this happens, they will also suffer an additional 247 Spirit damage. Your healing output is reduced by 10%.

data.name: Scatter The Winds
data.description:
Deals 768 Spirit damage to your target over 9 seconds, and causes all heals that they receive to become 50% less effective.

1-4 Force: Strikethrough increased by 10%.
5 Force: Strikethrough increased by 20% and duration increased by 6 seconds.

data.name: Increased Conductivity
data.description: Searing Touch now deals damage every second, but has its duration reduced by 3 seconds and its damage reduced by 25%. Your healing output is reduced by 10%.

data.name: Dissipating Energies
data.note:
Builds Force
Tranquility increases effectiveness.
Only usable on a non-stealthed player
Target can only be affected by one Dissipating Energies
data.description:
A groupmate becomes surrounded by dangerous energies for 5 seconds. Every 1 seconds, all enemies within 25 feet of them will suffer 212 Spirit damage.

1-4 Tranquility: 25% Cast Time reduction.
5 Tranquility: 50% Cast Time reduction and duration increased by 2 seconds.

data.name: Flames of the Phoenix
data.description: Flames burst from a spot that you select, damaging all enemies within 20 feet of that spot for 2400 over 4 seconds, as long as you maintain your concentration.

data.name: Balance Essence
data.description:
Deals 377 Spirit damage to your target, and heals your defensive target for 150% of the damage done.

1-4 Tranquility: 25% Cast Time reduction.
5 Tranquility: 50% Cast Time reduction and your outgoing healing is increased by 20% for 6 seconds.

data.name: Shield of Saphery
data.description:
Surrounds an ally with a magical barrier for up to 9 seconds which will absorb up to 1387 damage.

1-4 Force: Absorb increased by 15%.
5 Force: Absorb increased by 30% and cooldown reduced by 5 seconds.

data.name: Transfer Force
data.description:
Deals 1488 Spirit damage to your target over 24 seconds and heals your defensive target for 150% of the damage done on each tick.

1-4 Force: Strikethrough increased by 10%.
5 Force: Becomes undefendable.

data.name: Law of Age
data.description:
Your target and all other enemies within 20 feet of them have their Toughness reduced by 100 for 20 seconds.

1-4 Force: Strikethrough increased by 10%.
5 Force: Strikethrough increased by 20% and radius increased by 50%.

data.name: Rain Lord
data.description:
Your target and all other enemies within 20 feet of them have their Intelligence, Strength and Ballistic Skill reduced by 100 for 20 seconds.

1-4 Force: Strikethrough increased by 10%.
5 Force: Strikethrough increased by 20% and increase the Strength, Ballistic Skill and Intelligence of group members within 100 feet by 100 for 20 seconds.

data.name: Expanded Control
data.description: Balance Essence now has a Base heal of 656 health and Transfer Force heals your friendly target for  1242 health over 24 seconds. Balance Essence can be cast while moving, but the damage output from Balance Essence and Transfer Force is reduced by 50%.

data.name: Storm of Cronos
data.description:
A cone of energy strikes enemies in front of you, up to 65 feet away, dealing 409 Spirit damage and reducing their Spirit resistance by 240 for 20 seconds.

1-4 Tranquility: Damage increased by 15%.
5 Tranquility: Damage increased by 30% and Strikethrough increased by 10%.

data.name: Arcing Power
data.description: Whenever one of your direct damaging spells hits an enemy, your defensive target will become healed for 33% of the damage that you dealt. Balance Essence and Transfer Force have a 10% reduced chance to be defended against.

data.name: Law of Gold
data.description:
Deals 396 Spirit damage and silences your target, making them unable to use magic for 5 seconds.

1-4 Tranquility: Strikethrough increased by 10%.
5 Tranquility: Becomes undefendable.

data.name: Golden Aura
data.description: Shield of Saphery will now grant immunity to Stun and Knockdown effects while active. This effect will linger for 3 seconds after the shield is removed.

data.name: Energy of Vaul
data.description:
A wash of power leeches the breath from your target and up to four other enemies within 20 feet of them, dealing 274 Spirit damage to each. Then healing your defensive target and allies within 20 feet of them for 877 health, plus 50% of the total inflicted damage. When casting this ability, you will focus your power into ensuring a hit rather than for maximum damage, causing it to be 20% less likely to be Blocked or Disrupted.

1-4 Tranquility: 25% Cast Time reduction.
5 Tranquility: Instant cast.

data.name: Funnel Energy
data.description: All enemies within 20 feet of your target have their action point costs increased by 50% for 15 seconds, and all allies within 20 feet of your defensive target have their action point costs reduced by 50% for 15 seconds.
